thread.title: New FAU coach Lane Kiffin couldn’t look less excited about FAU’s ‘exciting’ upcoming season | For The Win
thread.title_full: New FAU coach Lane Kiffin couldn’t look less excited about FAU’s ‘exciting’ upcoming season | For The Win

author: Andrew Joseph
title: New FAU coach Lane Kiffin couldn’t look less excited about FAU’s ‘exciting’ upcoming season | For The Win
text:
Follow @andyj0seph 
Lane Kiffin is super excited to be the head coach at Florida Atlantic. Really, so excited. 
He could hardly hold back the excitement in this promotional video from FAU. After all, these are exciting times. Commit to the Owls! Coach @Lane_Kiffin is bringing in the best recruits. Now we need the best fans! 
— FAU Football (@FAU_Football) January 27, 2017 
But seriously, why is Kiffin so miserable here? 
While Kiffin said “exciting” twice in this video, it looked like he was slowly dying inside. Or, he was possibly just trying to read with the sun in his eyes. After watching this I'm not 100% sure if Lane Kiffin isn't being held hostage at FAU pic.twitter.com/oS974EYl8O 
— Jack McGuire (@TailgateHeisman) January 31, 2017 
If the point of the video was to mobilize the FAU fanbase, Kiffin’s enthusiasm wasn’t necessarily at its best. More NCAAF!
